Hi all - seeking your help here!

Is there a way to record *weekly recurring revenue* in Deals in HubSpot. The process I followed is to create 4 MRR deals with a gap of one week. This may work, but will not be completely accurate.

Has anyone experience this issue before? Would love to hear your suggestions on this. Thanks.
